duties_responsibilities.duty: Manages all activities for multiple small projects or subtasks of larger projects, in accordance with approved plans.
Coordinates project requirements with client project management team to ensure high-quality project deliverables.
Develops project documents, processes, and procedures required to support quality control and final project deliverables.
Anticipates project staffing needs and collaborates with the Regional Program Manager to identify and select available personnel.
Establishes and communicates project safety plan, actively promotes safety policies, and monitors job site for good safety practices.
Collaborates with procurement staff for acquisition of qualified vendors and plans materials requirements.
Chairs regular job meetings, submits project progress and pending issues summaries, and submits routine reports to client and regional management.
Negotiates changes to the scope of work with the client and subcontractors, reviews bid documents, and assists with bidder solicitation activities.
Anticipates problems and implements corrective actions in collaboration with project stakeholders.
Maintains accurate documentation of job progress through daily logs and other reports.
Performs other responsibilities associated with the position as appropriate.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in a technical or construction related field (Master's preferred)
